IS THE APPLICANT A SUBSIDIARY OF ANOTHER.instruction: Indicates if the applicant is a subsidiary of another entity

PARENT COMPANY NAME.instruction: Name of the parent company if the applicant is a subsidiary

RELATIONSHIP DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of the relationship between the applicant and the parent company

PERCENTAGE OWNED.instruction: Percentage of the applicant owned by the parent company

DOES THE APPLICANT HAVE ANY SUBSIDIARIES.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has any subsidiaries

SUBSIDIARY COMPANY NAME.instruction: Name of the subsidiary company if the applicant has any

SUBSIDIARY RELATIONSHIP DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of the relationship between the applicant and the subsidiary company

SUBSIDIARY PERCENTAGE OWNED.instruction: Percentage of the subsidiary company owned by the applicant

NON-PAYMENT.instruction: Indicates if the reason for policy cancellation/non-renewal was non-payment

AGENT NO LONGER REPRESENTS CARRIER.instruction: Indicates if the reason for policy cancellation/non-renewal was the agent no longer representing the carrier

UNDERWRITING.instruction: Indicates if the reason for policy cancellation/non-renewal was underwriting

CONDITION CORRECTED.instruction: Indicates if the reason for policy cancellation/non-renewal was that the condition was corrected

CONDITION CORRECTED DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of the condition that was corrected

OCCURRENCE DATE.instruction: Date of the policy cancellation/non-renewal occurrence

RESOLUTION DATE.instruction: Date of the policy cancellation/non-renewal resolution

IS A FORMAL SAFETY PROGRAM IN OPERATION?.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has a formal safety program in operation

SAFETY MANUAL.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has a safety manual as part of their safety program

SAFETY POSITION.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has a dedicated safety position as part of their safety program

MONTHLY MEETINGS.instruction: Indicates if the applicant holds monthly safety meetings as part of their safety program

OSHA.instruction: Indicates if the applicant's safety program includes OSHA compliance

ANY EXPOSURE TO FLAMMABLES, EXPLOSIVES,.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has any exposure to flammables, explosives, or chemicals

EXPOSURE DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of the applicant's exposure to flammables, explosives, or chemicals

ANY OTHER INSURANCE WITH THIS COMPANY?.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has any other insurance policies with the same company

OTHER POLICY NUMBERS.instruction: List of other policy numbers the applicant has with the same company

ANY POLICY OR COVERAGE DECLINED, CANCELL.instruction: Indicates if the applicant had any policy or coverage declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the prior 3 years

ANY PAST LOSSES OR CLAIMS RELATING TO SE.instruction: Indicates if the applicant had any past losses or claims related to sexual abuse, molestation, discrimination or negligent hiring

DURING THE LAST FIVE YEARS (TEN IN RI),.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has been indicted or convicted of fraud, bribery, arson or any other arson-related crime in the last 5 (10 in RI) years

ANY UNCORRECTED FIRE ANDOR SAFETY CODE V.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has any uncorrected fire and/or safety code violations

HAS APPLICANT HAD A FORECLOSURE, REPOSSE.instruction: Indicates if the applicant had a foreclosure, repossession, bankruptcy or filed for bankruptcy in the last 5 years

HAS APPLICANT HAD A JUDGEMENT OR LIEN DU.instruction: Indicates if the applicant had a judgement or lien in the last 5 years

HAS BUSINESS BEEN PLACED IN A TRUST?.instruction: Indicates if the applicant's business has been placed in a trust

TRUST NAME.instruction: Name of the trust if the business has been placed in a trust

ANY FOREIGN OPERATIONS, FOREIGN PRODUCTS.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has any foreign operations, foreign products distributed in USA, or US products sold/distributed in foreign countries

DOES APPLICANT HAVE OTHER BUSINESS VENTU.instruction: Indicates if the applicant has other business ventures for which coverage is not requested

DOES APPLICANT OWN LEASE OPERATE ANY D.instruction: Indicates if the applicant owns, leases or operates any drones

DRONE USE DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of how the applicant uses any drones they own, lease or operate

DOES APPLICANT HIRE OTHERS TO OPERATE DR.instruction: Indicates if the applicant hires others to operate any drones they own or lease

HIRED DRONE OPERATOR USE DESCRIPTION.instruction: Description of how the applicant uses any hired drone operators
